results.title: Young Einstein
results.creator_credit: Yahoo Serious, David Roach, Warwick Ross and Serious Productions
results.brief_description: A classic Aussie comedy based on the premise that Albert Einstein not only developed the theory of relativity but also invented rock `n’ roll.

constellations_other.name: Great southern land?
constellations_other.description: Australia is often mythologised in film and TV, but national myths must not only be embraced, but resisted.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Yahoo Serious, David Roach, Warwick Ross and Serious Productions
results.description: A comedy based on the premise that Albert Einstein not only developed the theory of relativity but also invented rock `n’ roll. Albert Einstein sails the world, falls in love with the world’s most intelligent and beautiful girl, Marie Curie, creates the first surfboard, invents the electric guitar and uses rock’n’roll to save the planet from atomic destruction. Virtually a one-man tour de force by Yahoo Serious and co-starring Odile le Clezio, John Howard, Peewee Wilson, Su Cruickshank.
description_for_label: A comedy based on the premise that Albert Einstein not only developed the theory of relativity but also invented rock `n’ roll. Albert Einstein sails the world, falls in love with the world’s most intelligent and beautiful girl, Marie Curie, creates the first surfboard, invents the electric guitar and uses rock’n’roll to save the planet from atomic destruction. Virtually a one-man tour de force by Yahoo Serious and co-starring Odile le Clezio, John Howard, Peewee Wilson, Su Cruickshank.

results.title: Young and proud
results.creator_credit: Leah Latham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A young, successful and proud Yamatji woman, Leah Latham attributes the person she is today to growing up with different cultures. She acknowledges it can be hard being a mix of English and Indigenous cultures, but believes it has also made her the person she is today.

results.title: Young and just beginning: Pierre
results.brief_description: Focuses on Pierre Quinn, a young French-Canadian boy from Hauterive, Quebec, as he trains and performs along with other young dancers at the National Ballet School of Canada. When the school began, there were no male students but now of the 147 student one quarter are male. Theis change in attitude toward the male dancer was influenced to a great extent by Nuryev and Baryshnikov.

results.title: Young and Innocent = a Girl Was Young
results.creator_credit: Alfred Hitchcock, Edward Black, Gainsborough Pictures and GFD
results.brief_description: A mysterious man with a twitch in his eye; a young woman’s body washed ashore along with the raincoat belt used to strangle her; the supposedly innocent owner of the raincoat, fleeing from the police and frantically seeking the real murderer - all these elements combine to produce a full-speed, nail-biting mystery melodrama from the master of suspense, Alfred Hitchcock. Based on the novel A shilling for candles by Josephine Tey.

results.title: Young airmen: new strength for the RAAF
results.brief_description: The training of 16-year-old men as radio engineers at Melbourne Technical College. This info-documentary highlights the training and education of young men to join the air force. They are trained in radio, morse code and other techniques to allow them to detect enemy planes in darkness. “Radio technology is the tool of the future for communication” (1950). Photography: Geoff Thompson.

results.title: You will see me
results.creator_credit: Conor Bateman, Field Carr and Sari Braithwaite
results.brief_description: You will see me explores the way artists and amateurs alike have turned the camera on themselves since they became more accessible in the mid-20th century, and how this tradition is continued, amplified and tranformed through reality TV, the internet and social media.

constellations_primary.name: Copy, transform and combine
constellations_primary.description: You will see me (2020) repurposes material sourced from the history of the moving image â€“ archival footage, news, interviews, documentaries, reality TV, video diaries and social media â€“ to reflect on the way we perform in front of and reveal ourselves to the camera.

results.description: The camera doesnâ€™t just capture us, it frames who we are and how weâ€™re seen. Since the camera became more accessible in the mid-20th century, artists and amateurs alike have turned the lens on themselves to create a stage both private and public. This tradition is continued, amplified and transformed through reality TV, the internet and social media, the latest forms to use straight-to-camera techniques to share our common humanity, project authenticity and illuminate how a sense of self can be constructed through the moving image.
description_for_label: The camera doesnâ€™t just capture us, it frames who we are and how weâ€™re seen. Since the camera became more accessible in the mid-20th century, artists and amateurs alike have turned the lens on themselves to create a stage both private and public. This tradition is continued, amplified and transformed through reality TV, the internet and social media, the latest forms to use straight-to-camera techniques to share our common humanity, project authenticity and illuminate how a sense of self can be constructed through the moving image.

results.title: You were never lovelier
results.creator_credit: William A. Seiter, Louis F. Edelman and Columbia Pictures
results.brief_description: Fred Astaire and Rita Hayworth dance up a storm in this classic musical romance set in Buenos Aires. Maria (Hayworth) is the coolly elegant, eldest daughter of hotel magnate Edward Acuna, the most opinionated man in South America. Having inherited her father’s misanthropy, Maria has created havoc for her two sisters who can’t wed until she marries a man of Acuna’s choice. Along comes Robert Davies (Astaire), a carefree American dancer, down on his luck in Argentina. Unfortunately for Davies, Acuna can’t stand him, especially when he’s dancing around the hotel and chasing after his lovely daughter.
